final_answer: The image humorously contrasts two perspectives on fireworks. The left panel, labeled "YES," shows colorful fireworks, representing the exciting and celebratory aspect of such displays. The right panel, labeled "BUT," shows a dog and a cat hiding under furniture, illustrating how pets often react fearfully to the loud noises of fireworks. The humor lies in the juxtaposition of human enjoyment with animal anxiety, highlighting the unintended consequences of celebrations on pets.
